revision.comment: move field effects, including art follow-up, to its own section (they don't technically count as buffs)
revision.text:
{{for|the similar game mechanic in {{XCX}}|Buff|Debuff}} '''Status Effects''' are a game mechanic in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. They are temporary positive or negative effects applied to players or [[Enemy (XC3)|enemies]]. Positive effects are referred to in-game as buffs, and negative effects as debuffs. Additionally, debuffs are separated into physical debuffs and ether debuffs, which are governed by separate debuff resistance stats. Status Effects can be applied either directly to a target, or through the target entering a field. There also exist reaction type status effects, such as Blowdown and Knockback. Some Arts, such as [[Aureole (XC3)|Aureole]], apply random buffs or debuffs. Not all buffs and debuffs can be applied through random methods.
Status Effects are not to be confused with [[Combo]]s, involving [[Break (XC3)|Break]], [[Topple (XC3)|Topple]], [[Launch (XC3)|Launch]] and [[Smash (XC3)|Smash]], or [[Daze (XC3)|Daze]] and [[Burst]].
== List of Buffs == {| class="xc1 sortable" width="" 50% !Status Icon !Status Name !Status Effect !Randomly Applicable |- |[[File:XC3 Accuracy Up.png]] |[[Accuracy Up (XC3)|Accuracy Up]] |Boosts Accuracy |Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Armor Veil.png]] |[[Armor Veil]] |Absorbs a fixed amount of damage | Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Attack Up.png]] |[[Attack Up]] |Boosts damage dealt |Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Awakening.png]] |[[Awakening (XC3)|Awakening]] |Improves Attack, Defense, and recharge rate |No |- |[[File:XC3 Counter Heal.png]] |[[Counter Heal]] |Heal [[Hit Points (XC3)|HP]] when hit, for a set number of hits |Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Critical Hit Plus.png]] |[[Critical Hit Plus]] |Boosts [[Critical Hit]] extra damage |Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Crit rate up.png]] |[[Critical Rate Up (XC3)|Critical Rate Up]] | Boosts Critical Rate |Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Debuff Barrier.png]] |[[Debuff Barrier]] | Nullifies set number of enemy debuffs |Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Decoy.png]] |[[Decoy (XC3)|Decoy]] |Evades attacks a set number of times |Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Defense Up.png]] |[[Defense Up]] |Reduces damage taken |Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Delayed Healing.png]] |[[Delayed Healing]] | Heals HP when below a set value | Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Ether Anchor.png]] |[[Ether Anchor]] |Nullifies a set number of [[Combo]] reactions | Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Evasion Up.png]] |[[Evasion Up (XC3)|Evasion Up]] |Improves Evasion |Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Fast Recharge.png]] |[[Fast Recharge]] |Improves rate of recharge |Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Invincible.png]] |[[Invincible (XC3)|Invincible]] |Nullifies attacks from enemies |No |- |[[File:XC3 Pause Buff Timer.png]] |[[Pause Buff Timer]] |Freezes timer on all other active buffs |No |- |[[File:XC3 Power Charge.png]] |[[Power Charge]] |Boosts Damage of next [[Battle Arts (XC3)|Art]] |Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Recovery Up.png]] |[[Recovery Up (XC3)|Recovery Up]] |Boosts amount of HP healed |Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Regenerate.png]] |[[Regenerate (XC3)|Regenerate]] |Heals HP at fixed intervals |No |- |[[File:XC3FR Nullify All Attacks Icon.png]] |[[Nullify Most Attacks]] |Nullifies attacks (with exceptions) |No |}
==List of Debuffs== {| class="xc1 sortable" width="" 50% !Status Icon !Status Name !Status Effect !Type !Randomly Applicable |- |[[File:XC3 Accuracy Down.png]] |[[Accuracy Down]] |Reduces Accuracy |Physical |Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Attack Down.png]] |[[Attack Down]] |Reduces damage dealt |Physical |Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Bind.png]] |[[Bind (XC3)|Bind]] |Makes it impossible to move |Ether |Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Blaze Icon.png]] |[[Blaze (XC3)|Blaze]] |Deals damage at fixed intervals | Ether |No |- |[[File:XC3 Bleed.png]] |[[Bleed (XC3)|Bleed]] |Deals damage at fixed intervals | Physical |No |- |[[File:XC3 Damage Link.png]] |[[Damage Link]] |Relays damage taken to nearby allies |Ether |No |- |[[File:XC3 Eclipse Soul.png]] |[[Eclipse Soul]] | Makes allies attack one another | Ether |No |- |[[File:XC3 Ether Defense Down.png]] |[[Ether Defense Down (XC3)|Ether Defense Down]] |Reduces [[Ether Defence|Ether Defense]] |Ether |Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Evasion Down.png]] |[[Evasion Down]] |Reduces Evasion |Physical |Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Flame Clock Low, Attack Down.png]] |[[Flame Clock#Gameplay|Flame Clock Low, Attack Down]] |Reduces Attack when [[Flame Clock]] is less than 1/4 full. |Ether |No |- |[[File:XC3 Freeze.png]] |[[Freeze]] |Deals damage at fixed intervals |Ether |No |- |[[File:XC3 Heal Bind.png]] |[[Heal Bind]] |Incapacitates [[Healer]]s | Ether |No |- |[[File:XC3 Interlink Seal.png]] |[[Interlink Seal]] |Seals [[Interlink]] with [[Moebius]]'s power |Ether |No |- |[[File:XC3 Moebius Shackles.png]] |[[Moebius Shackles]] |Stops a character from moving | Physical |No |- |[[File:XC3 Phys. Defense Down.png]] |[[Phys Def Down (XC3)|Phys. Def Down]] |Reduces [[Physical Defence|Physical Defense]] |Physical |Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Reduce All.png]] |[[Reduce All]] |Reduces damage, accuracy, evasion, and defense |Ether |No |- |[[File:XC3 Resistance Down.png]] |[[Resistance Down]] |Reduces resistance to debuffs |Ether |Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Shackle Arts.png]] |[[Shackle Arts]] |Makes it impossible to use arts | Physical |No |- |[[File:XC3 Shackle Blocking.png]] |[[Shackle Blocking]] |Makes it impossible to block |Physical |Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Shackle Healing.png]] |[[Shackle Healing]] |Makes it impossible to heal HP |Ether |No |- |[[File:XC3 Shield Bind.png]] |[[Shield Bind]] |Incapacitates [[Defender (XC3)|Defenders]] |Ether |No |- |[[File:XC3 Slow Recharge.png]] |[[Slow Recharge]] |Reduces rate of recharge |Ether |No |- |[[File:XC3 Sleep Icon.png]] |[[Sleep (XC3)|Sleep]] |Incapacitates until damage is taken |Ether |Yes |- |[[File:XC3 Sword Bind.png]] |[[Sword Bind]] | Incapacitates [[Attacker]]s |Ether |No |- |[[File:XC3 Target Lock.png]] | [[Target Lock]] |Locks enemy into targeting user |Physical |No |- |[[File:XC3 Toxin.png]] |[[Toxin]] |Deals damage at fixed intervals |Ether |No |} ==Field Effects == The following field effects grant benefits or penalties to characters and/or enemies that stand in them. They do not count as buffs or debuffs for the game mechanics that use them, even if the effect name coincides with that of a buff or debuff. {| class="xc1 sortable" !Field Icon !Field Effect Name !Effect !Base Duration |- |[[File:XC3 Buff Field.png]] |[[Critical Rate Up]] |Boosts Critical Rate of allies by 40% (multiplicative). |15.0s |- |[[File:XC3 Buff Field.png]] |[[Armor Veil]] |Absorbs up to 20% of field setter's HP, cumulative across all allies in the field. |10.0s |- |[[File:XC3 Buff Field.png]] |[[Attack Up]] |Boosts damage dealt by allies by 40% (additive with most damage-increasing effects). |15.0s |- |[[File:XC3 Buff Field.png]] |[[Defense Up]] |Reduces damage taken to allies by 15%. |10.0s |- |[[File:XC3 Buff Field.png]] |[[Fast Recharge]] |Boosts Art recharge of allies by 20%. |15.0s |- |[[File:XC3 Buff Field.png]] |[[Evasion Up (XC3)|Evasion Up]] |Boosts Evasion of allies by 8%. |10.0s |- |[[File:XC3 DOT Field.png]] |[[Blaze]] |Deals damage equal to 50% of the Attack stat of the person who set the Field to enemies every 1.0s. |10.0s |- |[[File:XC3 DOT Field.png]] |[[Art Follow-Up]] |Deals damage equal to 2 times the Attack stat of the person who set the Field, when an ally in the field uses an art. |15.0s |- |[[File:XC3 Heal Field.png]] |[[Regenerate (XC3)|Regenerate]] |Periodically heals allies for a proportion of the field setter's Healing Power (the amount of healing and frequency varies by Art). |Varies from 10.0s-30.0s, depending on Art that sets the field |- |[[File:XC3 Blaze & Regenerate Icon.png]] |Blaze & Regenerate |Periodically heals allies for 100% of the field setter's Healing Power every 2.0s, and deals damage equal to 100% of Attack of the field setter to enemies every 2.0s. |10.0s |- |[[File:XC3 Heal Field.png]] |[[Arts Heal]] |When an ally standing in the field uses an Art, heals an amount equal to 50% of Healing Power of the field setter. |15.0s |} ==Other Effects== There are a few positive or negative effects in the game that are not considered a Status Effect. When in the [[Malevolent Hollow]] cave system, Interlinking is prevented for an unknown reason. This effect is similar to Interlink Seal, but doesn't have an icon associated with it. Additionally, the [[Royal Summoner]] class has an unexplained mechanic known as '''Elemental Buffs''', which are associated with the elementals created using the [[Summon Element]] art, and are applied to the whole party. Flare Elementals give +5% damage per orb, Earth Elementals give +5% damage reduction per orb, and Aqua Elementals give +1% max HP per orb. These elemental buffs are affected by the "'''Here I Shall Stand'''" class ability, which increases buff effects by 30%-50% depending on [[Class Rank (XC3)|Class Rank]].
== Trivia == * There exists an [[List of Xenoblade Chronicles 3 pre-release and unused content|unused]] buff in the base game's files named "18", with its own icon, and description reading: "''Moebius energy nullifies all attacks''". This effect is very similar to a the "''Nullify Most Attacks''" debuff introduced in {{XC3FR|sub}}.
==Gallery== ===Field Icons=== <gallery> XC3 Buff Field.png|Buff Field icon XC3 Debuff Field.png|Debuff Field icon XC3 DOT Field.png|Damage over time Field icon XC3 Heal Field.png|Healing based Field icon XC3 Defender Field Icon.png|Icon for Field produced around Defender party members XC3 Blaze & Regenerate Icon.png|Blaze & Regenerate Icon, only used by [[Pride of Place]] </gallery>
=== Unused Icons=== <gallery> XC3 Unused buff 1.png|Unused buff icon XC3 Unknown Reaction.png|Unused status reaction icon </gallery> {{clr}} [[Category:XC3 Status]]

{{Infobox Gem | name = Steady Striker | image = Gem-speciality.png | effect = [Passive] Shortens auto-attack interval by ''(value)%''. | category = Speciality | max = 40% }} '''Steady Striker''' is a Speciality [[Gem]] in {{XC3}}. It is the only gem that is not available in {{XC3FR|sublink}}, where it is replaced by [[Flowing Form]]. == Gem Stats == {| class="xc1 gem-stats centered" style="width: 200px" ! !Shorter Auto-Attack Interval |- !I |15% |- !II |17% |- !III |20% |- !IV |22% |- !V |25% |- !VI |27% |- !VII |30% |- !VIII |32% |- !IX |35% |- !X |40% |} == List of Gems == At [[Rest Spot (XC3)|Rest Spots]], [[Riku]] will [[Gem Crafting|craft]] [[Gem]]s using items picked up during adventures or acquired from [[enemy (XC3)|enemies]]. If the required item/s is/are missing, the party can instead exchange [[Nopon Coin (Gold)|Gold Nopon Coins]] to craft the gem without having to consume any of the required items. {| class="xc1 sortable centered" width=100% !Name!!Ingredients!!Rarity!!Coin Cost |- |Steady Striker I |[[Gemstone]]

|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Steam Belt |image = XC3 Accessory Belt.png |caption = Boosts Attack by 20%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 2330 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Steam Belt |image = XC3 Accessory Belt.png |caption = Boosts Attack by 21%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 2330 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Steam Belt |image = XC3 Accessory Belt.png |caption = Boosts Attack by 22%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 2330 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Steam Belts''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

{{Infobox Gem | name = Steel Protection | image = Gem-defender.png | effect = [Passive] Increases Block Rate by ''(value)'' percentage points. | category = Defender | max = 30 }} '''Steel Protection''' is a Defender [[Gem]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. == Gem Stats == {| class="xc1 gem-stats centered" style="width: 200px" ! !Block Rate Increase |- !I |5 |- !II |7 |- !III |10 |- !IV |12 |- !V |15 |- !VI |17 |- !VII |20 |- !VIII |22 |- !IX |25 |- !X |30 |} == List of Recipes== At [[Rest Spot (XC3)|Rest Spots]], [[Riku]] will [[Gem Crafting|craft]] [[Gem]]s using items picked up during adventures or acquired from [[enemy (XC3)|enemies]]. {{Infobox Gem | name = Steelcleaver | image = Gem-attacker.png | effect = [Passive] Increases Attack by ''(value)''. | category = Attacker | max = 70 }} '''Steelcleaver''' is a Attacker [[Gem]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. == Gem Stats == {| class="xc1 gem-stats centered" style="width: 200px" ! !Attack Increase |- !I |20 |- !II |25 |- !III |30 |- !IV |35 |- !V |40 |- !VI |45 |- !VII |50 |- !VIII |55 |- ! IX |60 |- !X |70 |} == List of Recipes== At [[Rest Spot (XC3)|Rest Spots]], [[Riku]] will [[Gem Crafting|craft]] [[Gem]]s using items picked up during adventures or acquired from [[enemy (XC3)|enemies]]. If the required items are missing, the party can instead exchange [[Nopon Coin (Gold)|Gold Nopon Coins]] to craft the gem without having to consume any of the required items. === {{XC3|-}} === {| class="xc1 sortable centered" width=100% !Name!!Ingredients!!Rarity!!Coin Cost |- |Steelcleaver I |[[Gemstone]]

revision.text:
{{Spoiler}} {{quote|An adroit, tactical Healer who uses special guns to aid allies in various ways, as well as weakening foes.|Class menu description}} [[File:XC3 Strategos Weapon Icon.png|thumb|The Strategos class icon]] '''Strategos''' is an [[Agnus|Agnian]] [[Healer]] [[Class (XC3)|class]] in {{XC3}}. == Overview == Strategos is the class of [[Isurd]]. It is a class that uses [[Blade (XC3)|Disc Launchers]] to assist allies in various ways, as well as weakening foes. It is unlocked by completing the [[Hero Quest]] ''[[Unwavering Resolve]]''. The [[Class Rank (XC3)|Class Rank]] maximum can be increased to 20 by completing the Ascension Quest ''[[Effervescent Heart]]''. {{clr}} ==Class Aptitude and Unlock Requirements== {|class="xc1 centered" style="width:100%; valign:center;" !Party Member |[[File:Icon chara battle n0ah.png|60px]]
'''[[Noah]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 1.png|60px]]
'''[[Mio]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 2.png|60px]]
'''[[Eunie]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 3.png|60px]]
'''[[Taion]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 4.png|60px]]
'''[[Lanz]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 5.png|60px]]
'''[[Sena]]''' |- !Aptitude |[[File:XC3 Aptitude B Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude B Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude A Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude S Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude D Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude C Icon.png|35px]] |- !Class Unlock Points Required |3,450 |4,315 |2,590 |''Class Inheritor'' |6,040 |5,175 |} == Class Rank Requirements == {| class="xc1 centered" width="45%" ! Rank ! CP needed ! Nopon Coin Cost |- | 1 | colspan="2" | None |- | 2 | 250 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 2 |- | 3 | 250 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 2 |- | 4 | 310 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 5 | 310 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 6 | 375 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 7 | 375 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 8 | 405 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 9 | 405 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 10 | 435 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | colspan="3" class="event" | Complete ''[[Effervescent Heart]]'' |- | 11 | 390 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | 12 | 390 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | 13 | 525 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | 14 | 525 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 15 | 650 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 16 | 650 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 17 | 780 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 18 | 780 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 6 |- | 19 | 850 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 6 |- | 20 | 975 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 6 |} {{clr}} == Class Stats == The Strategos class grants the following multipliers to a character's base stats (see their individual pages for their base stats), and sets their Physical and Ether Defense to the following values, depending on their current Rank. Intermediate values are linearly interpolated between the minimum and maximum values, rounding to the nearest percent. {| class="xc1 centered" width="100%" ! Rank !! HP !! Attack !! Healing Power !! Dexterity !! Agility !! Physical Defense !! Ether Defense |- | 1 || 60% || 60% || 110% || 105% || 80% || 5% || 25% |- | 10 || 62% || 62% || 112% || 107% || 82% || 7% || 27% |- | 20 || 65% || 65% || 115% || 110% || 85% || 10% || 30% |} === Weapon Stats === The character's Attack stat after being modified by the above class stats is further modified by adding the class's weapon stat, which depends on the character's [[Level (XC3)|Level]], to obtain the final base Attack stat. These weapon stats also determine the character's Critical Rate and Block Rate. Characters temporarily assume these weapon stats to calculate relevant statistics when using a Master Art from this Class without it being part of a Fusion Art. If a Master Art is used in a Fusion Art, the character's current Class will be used instead for calculations. {| class="xc1 centered" width="60%" ! Level !! Attack !! Critical Rate !! Block Rate |- | 1 || 16 || 5% || 3% |- | 10 || 35 || 6% || 3% |- | 20 || 62 || 7% || 4% |- | 30 || 96 || 8% || 4% |- | 40 || 133 || 9% || 4% |- | 50 || 178 || 10% || 5% |- | 60 || 227 || 11% || 5% |- | 70 || 281 || 12% || 5% |- | 80 || 344 || 13% || 5% |- | 90 || 413 || 14% || 6% |- | 99 || 483 || 15% || 6% |} == Arts == * '''[[Soulfire (XC3)|Soulfire]]''' ([[Battle Arts (XC3)|Talent Art]]), Heal all on hit/Atk down * [[No Love Lost (XC3)|No Love Lost]], Physical Def. down (Rank 1 Master Art) * [[Mirror Trap]], AOE / Counter Heal * [[Hornet]], Area heal on hit (Rank 10 Master Art) * [[Moondog]], Field / [[Regenerate (XC3)|Regenerate]] * [[Earth Bind]], Bind === Hero-Exclusive Arts === * [[Gyreflow]], Field / Regenerate * [[Razor Wind]], Area heal on hit * [[Moonshadow]], [[Bind (XC3)|Bind]] == Class Skills == * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 20.png]] '''Strengthening Gambit''': Extends duration of buff effects issued by 30-50%. (Rank 5 Master Skill) * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 10.png]] '''Prowess Gambit''': Buffing an ally boosts damage dealt by 20-30% (up to a maximum of 200%). * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 20.png]] '''Sapping Gambit''': Extends duration timers of debuffs applied to enemies by 30-50%. * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 22.png]] '''Preemption Gambit''': 60-100% chance to grant all allies Attack Up on a preemptive attack. (Rank 15 Master Skill) === Stat Increases === {| class="xc1 centered" style="width:100%;" !Class Rank !Prowess Gambit !Sapping Gambit !Strengthening Gambit !Preemption Gambit |- | 1 | 20% | 30% | 30% | 60% |- | 5 | 22% | 35% | 35% | 70% |- | 10 | 25% | 40% | 40% | 80% |- | 15 | 27% | 45% | 45% | 90% |- | 20 | 30% | 50% | 50% | 100% |} {{clr}} == Gallery == XC3 Isurd Artwork.png|Isurd, a Strategos Strategos Noah.png|Noah as a Strategos Strategos Mio.png|Mio as a Strategos Strategos Eunie.png|Eunie as a Strategos Strategos Taion.png|Taion as a Strategos Strategos Lanz.png|Lanz as a Strategos Strategos Sena.png|Sena as a Strategos {{clr}} [[Category:XC3 Classes]]

|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Strike Bangle |image = XC3 Accessory Gauntlet.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt when attacking from the front by 20%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 10,690 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Strike Bangle |image = XC3 Accessory Gauntlet.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt when attacking from the front by 22%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 10,690 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Strike Bangle |image = XC3 Accessory Gauntlet.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt when attacking from the front by 24%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 10,690 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Strike Bangles''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]
